channel.title: Show off riku's keyblade
channel.description:
so this is my first model i want some critisism but nothing very harsh please cuz this is my first and please tell me how i can make it better and if enough people ask and its good i will think about releasing it :)
and one thing i know people are going to say is it needs to be "sharper" i know this i just don't know how to make it sharper so if anyone knows could u let me know.
[IMG]http://i39.photobucket.com/albums/e184/runescape_freak/Capture.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.photobucket.com/albums/e184/runescape_freak/rikublade3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.photobucket.com/albums/e184/runescape_freak/rikublade4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.photobucket.com/albums/e184/runescape_freak/rikukeyblade2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.photobucket.com/albums/e184/runescape_freak/somecolor.jpg[/img]

item.title: Show off riku's keyblade
item.dc:creator: @dragonmaster99 dragonmaster99
item.description:
@dragonmaster99 wrote:

thank u coonhunter for explaining this it is my first model but i was thinking about scraping this one and making a dif model that i found is easyer to work wilth.
and i was trying to use wings 3d or blender but cant figure out how to make anything yet so oh well i’ll keep ya’ll updated and it took me like four hours to make this with doing stuff for my now non pregnant girlfriend @off topic@ which my beautiful baby girl was born july 24th and 7:15 pm weighting 8 pounds 14 ounces and was 22 inches long @on topic@ but anyways im going to start a new model and its going to be better. more detailed i hope

Read full topic

item.title: Show off riku's keyblade
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“frogtamer101, post:9, topic:290655”]Just a trace made 3d
Work a little harder curving parts out and making the blade come togther so it looks sharp. Good trace and colors though dont just extrude it please its just looks like a 3 seccond model :D[/quote]
This “3 second model”, I hope you mean just a model without enough time spent on it. Frog, think about this, when you first start with models, this can actually take up to 90 minutes because you are getting used to the different options you can use. I don’t recall seeing any of his past models, if he has any. Also, look at the post above, he doesn’t know how to use Prims yet, so take that into consideration that this is his first.

Read full topic

item.title: Show off riku's keyblade
item.dc:creator: @frogtamer101 frogtamer101
item.description:
@frogtamer101 wrote:

Just a trace made 3d
Work a little harder curving parts out and making the blade come togther so it looks sharp. Good trace and colors though dont just extrude it please its just looks like a 3 seccond model

Read full topic

item.title: Show off riku's keyblade
item.dc:creator: @dragonmaster99 dragonmaster99
item.description:
@dragonmaster99 wrote:

ok i know how to make it look sharper but could you please explain how to use the prim to make a chain? and how to make it rounded?

ok so i found out how to make something rounded at least i think. there is a rounded button on the selected menu do i use it?

----EDit----
ok so i’m thinking about scraping this model and making a new one becuase its easyer to make then come back to this model when im more experinced.

Read full topic

item.title: Show off riku's keyblade
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

jjones10:

Make it so its not one big square. At the moment that would be heavy, awkward and unhamrfull. suggest making it sharp and round in all the apropriat places

Also, a little less thick, as for the chain, use primitives.

Read full topic
